description: Manage shared gallery image with VM.

commands.name: az sig image-definition create
commands.syntax:
az sig image-definition create --gallery-image-definition
                               --gallery-name
                               --offer
                               --os-type {Linux, Windows}
                               --publisher
                               --resource-group
                               --sku
                               [--architecture {Arm64, x64}]
                               [--description]
                               [--disallowed-disk-types]
                               [--end-of-life-date]
                               [--eula]
                               [--features]
                               [--hyper-v-generation {V1, V2}]
                               [--location]
                               [--maximum-cpu-core]
                               [--maximum-memory]
                               [--minimum-cpu-core]
                               [--minimum-memory]
                               [--os-state {Generalized, Specialized}]
                               [--plan-name]
                               [--plan-product]
                               [--plan-publisher]
                               [--privacy-statement-uri]
                               [--release-note-uri]
                               [--tags]
examples:
az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Generalized

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type windows --os-state Specialized

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type windows --os-state Generalized

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized --plan-name PlanName \
--plan-product PlanProduct --plan-publisher PlanPublisher

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--features IsHibernateSupported=true

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--features IsAcceleratedNetworkSupported=true

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--features SecurityType=TrustedLaunch

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--features SecurityType=ConfidentialVmSupported

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--features SecurityType=ConfidentialVM

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--features SecurityType=TrustedLaunchSupported

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--features SecurityType=TrustedLaunchAndConfidentialVmSupported

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--end-of-life-date YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+00:00

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--minimum-cpu-core myMinCPU --maximum-cpu-core myMaxCPU \
--minimum-memory myMinMemory --maximum-memory myMaxMemory

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--disallowed-disk-types Standard_LRS

az sig image-definition create --resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage \
--publisher GreatPublisher --offer GreatOffer --sku GreatSku \
--os-type linux --os-state Specialized \
--eula path_to_eula --privacy-statement-uri path_to_statement \
--release-note-uri path_to_release_notes

commands.name: az sig image-definition delete
commands.syntax:
az sig image-definition delete [--gallery-image-definition]
                               [--gallery-name]
                               [--ids]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--subscription]

commands.name: az sig image-definition list
commands.summary: List gallery image definitions in a gallery.

commands.name: az sig image-definition list-community
commands.summary: List VM Image definitions in a gallery community.
examples:
az sig image-definition list-community --public-gallery-name publicGalleryName \
--location myLocation

commands.name: az sig image-definition list-community
commands.summary: List VM Image definitions in a gallery community (preview).
examples:
az sig image-definition list-community --public-gallery-name publicGalleryName \
--location myLocation

commands.name: az sig image-definition list-shared
commands.summary: List VM Image definitions in a gallery shared directly to your subscription or tenant.
examples:
az sig image-definition list-shared --gallery-unique-name galleryUniqueName \
--location myLocation

az sig image-definition list-shared --gallery-unique-name galleryUniqueName \
--location myLocation --shared-to tenant

commands.name: az sig image-definition show
commands.summary: Get information about a gallery image definition.

commands.name: az sig image-definition show-community
commands.summary: Get an image in a gallery community (preview).
examples:
az sig image-definition show-community --public-gallery-name publicGalleryName \
--gallery-image-definition myGalleryImageName --location myLocation

commands.name: az sig image-definition show-shared
examples: az sig image-definition show-shared --gallery-unique-name galleryUniqueName --gallery-image-definition myGalleryImageName --location myLocation

commands.name: az sig image-definition update
commands.syntax:
az sig image-definition update [--add]
                               [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--gallery-image-definition]
                               [--gallery-name]
                               [--ids]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--remove]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--set]
                               [--subscription]
examples: az sig image-definition update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage --resource-group MyResourceGroup --set recommended.vCpUs.min=myNewvCpUsMin recommended.vCpUs.max=myNewvCpUsMax recommended.memory.min=myNewMemoryMin recommended.memory.max=myNewMemoryMax description="newDescription"
az sig image-definition update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gallery-name MyGallery --gallery-image-definition MyImage --resource-group MyResourceGroup --remove recommended.vCpUs.min

commands.name: az sig image-definition wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
